name: @ubilabs/google-maps-react-hooks-examples
description: A sample Google Map setup with the MapProvider component.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run types
scripts.start:map: npm run clean-examples && cross-env $(cat .env) PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel serve ./basic-google-map/index.html --dist-dir public --port 1234 --no-cache
scripts.start:map-with-markers: npm run clean-examples && cross-env $(cat .env) PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel serve ./google-map-with-markers/index.html --dist-dir public --port 1234 --no-cache
scripts.start:geocoding: npm run clean-examples && cross-env $(cat .env) PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel serve ./geocoding/index.html --dist-dir public --port 1234 --no-cache
scripts.start:places: npm run clean-examples && cross-env $(cat .env) PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel serve ./places/index.html --dist-dir public --port 1234 --no-cache
scripts.start:places-autocomplete: npm run clean-examples && cross-env $(cat .env) PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel serve ./places-autocomplete/index.html --dist-dir public --port 1234 --no-cache
scripts.start:directions: npm run clean-examples && cross-env $(cat .env) PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel serve ./directions/index.html --dist-dir public --port 1234 --no-cache
scripts.start:distance-matrix: npm run clean-examples && cross-env $(cat .env) PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel serve ./distance-matrix/index.html --dist-dir public --port 1234 --no-cache
scripts.preversion: echo "To create a new library version run 'npm version -w library' in the repository root."
